item.title: API Documentation Assignment
item.description:
Assignment Title:

The Movie Database (TMDb) API Documentation
In this assignment, you will create API documentation for **The Movie Database** (TMDb) API using Postman or any API platform you can use (Eg, `Readme`,`Postman`), a popular movie and TV show database API. The goal is to teach you how to access and document real-world APIs effectively.

Postman guide: Read this article to understand postman as a beginner

item.title: Glasp User Guide Assignment
item.description: This assignment, you will write an article covering everything about Glasp https://glasp.co/ and how to use it
